Lady Hawk was surprised that Zardus couldn't figure out the simple logic
placed in front of him. "Those were just examples. I was thinking about the
long term effects of the DNA merging, This planet is rich in energeon, you
could control the fight by controling the best creatures to mine it." she
looked around the room as if she were talking to a group instead of an
individual, "These creations could well be the next generation of
transformer." the female tried remembering her history lessons, "When I was
newly created my home galaxy was overrun by insecticons, some planets were
stripped clean of life while the insecticons avoided other more lively
planets altogether. A scientist looked into the problem and realized that
the planets that were avoided were full of avian life that lived off insect
life. The insecticons took on the survival instincts of the creatures they
turned into. The logical solution was to create avian modes for our
translife." she paused trying to speak without revealing to much. "Anyway
the point is that everything has a predator and prey. I hope to combine
those qualities and remove most of the psychological fears."
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, March 14, 2001 10:03 AM
Subject: Re: Fighting and Creating
